column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////SIMPLY DELICIOUS! We had the pinxtos for an appetizer
column3: and finally the dessert pinxtos. The place was popping. It was a 2 hour wait on a Friday night - so don't forget to make reservations ahead of time! Despite that
column5: was so attentive. He kept on refilling our sangria glasses (great sangria btw!) and taking away our dirty plates. The food
column6: although it comes in small portions
column7: was amazing and very filling. It's perfect for sharing. My roommates and I had a little bit of everything that each of us ordered. With so many different flavors
column8: my palette was in heaven :) Definitely recommend to anyone in the mood for some great tapas! (keep in mind though that this place is a little pricey)
